PMU exceptions taken to the current Exception level are not affected by this field.

field_description.para: Performance Monitors Exception Enable. Controls the generation of PMUIRQ signal and PMU exception at EL0 and EL1.
This field is ignored by the PE when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL3 is implemented. MDCR_EL3.PMEE != 0b01.
All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security State. MDCR_EL2.PMEE != 0b01.
